#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
    int main(){
        int t,n,guest=0,maxc=0,i,j;
        int a[105],b[105];
        scanf("%d",&t);
        while(t--){
            scanf("%d",&n);
                for(i=0;i<n;i++)
                    scanf("%d",&a[i]);
                for(i=0;i<n;i++)
                    scanf("%d",&b[i]);
                    guest=0,maxc=0;
                for(i=1;i<=1000;i++){
                    for(j=0;j<n;j++){
                    if(a[j]==i)
                        guest++;
                        if(maxc<=guest)
                            maxc=guest;
                    if(b[j]==i)
                        guest--;
                    
                    }
                }    
                    printf("%d\n",maxc);
        }
        return 0;
    }
